tool_description: Generates concise SMS messages for order confirmations and updates, optimized for character limits and mobile delivery.

message_type.description: Type of SMS message: confirmation, receipt, shipping, delivery

error_messages: Invalid message_type: Must be one of [confirmation, receipt, shipping, delivery]
Invalid currency: Currency must be a valid 3-letter ISO code
Content too long: Generated message exceeds SMS character limit
Missing required data: All required fields must be provided for message generation
usage: Provide customer_name, order_id, order_total, currency, and message_type. The tool generates a concise SMS message appropriate for the specified type.

character_count.description: Number of characters in the SMS message

message_type.description: Type of message that was generated

estimated_cost.description: Estimated cost to send this SMS
